news_content: Enrollment for the upcoming Semester will start on January 5, 2024, and will end on February 9, 2024. Please ensure to complete all necessary requirements.
Welcome back! The Semester 2024 is set to commence on February 20, 2024. Get ready for an exciting academic term filled with learning and opportunities.

news_title: Important Reminders for Second Semester Enrollment
news_content: As enrollment for the second semester approaches, please review the guidelines and ensure all necessary documents are prepared. Contact the registrar's office for assistance.
To kick off the Semester, orientation sessions will be held on February 18, 2024. Attend to familiarize yourself with campus updates, academic expectations, and resources.
If you missed the initial enrollment period, late enrollment requests will be accepted until February 15, 2024. Be sure to contact the registrar's office for guidance on the process.
The course add/drop period for the Semester will be open from February 21 to February 28, 2024. Make adjustments to your schedule as needed during this time.
If you are applying for financial aid for the Semester, the deadline is February 10, 2024. Ensure all required documents are submitted to the financial aid office.
The class schedule for the second semester is now available. Review your schedule and reach out to the academic advising office if you have any conflicts or concerns.
Mark your calendars! Check the school website for a list of important dates for the Semester, including exams, holidays, and special events.
Attention graduating students! An information session regarding graduation requirements and commencement ceremonies will be held on February 25, 2024. Don't miss out on this important session.
